attributes.action: Review the circumstances under which tube drivers can go on strike and shut down the network, ensuring that strike action is only undertaken as a very last resort
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It cannot be acceptable for the RMT to cause havoc whenever they feel like it. And usually without exhausting other avenues first. The tube network is a vital service for London, its impact on the lives of Londoners is as serious as any of our emergency services and they do not strike at the drop of a hat! Strikes should be the very last resort. Why should the RMT be allowed to get away with it?

rejection.details: Your petition may no longer be relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
